scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection contains American writer Ann Beattie's introduction to "Best American Short Stories, 1987," as well as two undated letters from Beattie to Robie Macauley regarding Peter Taylor; vacation plans; a new novel by Valerie Martin [ The recent martyr]; Beattie's introduction for "Best American short stories, 1987"; and her request that copies of the book be sent to the people on an enclosed list.
